name: Vegetable Pizza Squares
author: Cindy Carnes
summary: These are made on a small baking sheet, and are absolutely delicious!  My kids have taken this recipe to school so the class could make it, and it has been a hit.
ingredients: 2 (10 ounce) cans refrigerated crescent roll dough
½ cup chopped green bell peppers
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Unroll crescent roll dough on a small baking sheet
Arrange into a single layer to serve as a crust
Bake in the preheated oven 10 minutes, or until puffed and lightly browned
In a medium bowl, mix cream cheese, mayonnaise, dill weed, onion and garlic
Spread the cream cheese mixture over the crescent roll dough crust
Layer with cauliflower, broccoli and green peppers
Chill in the refrigerator until serving
